# Tidy data

Sequence of scripts:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
scripts <- c("replicateOno.Rmd",
             "readAhles.Rmd",
             "readTager.Rmd",
             "readSchagen.Rmd",
             "reshapeOno.Rmd",
             "addFromDataAbstraction.Rmd",
             "combineData.Rmd")
```

`r paste(scripts, collapse=" %>% ")`

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=2, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(devtools)
source_gist("https://gist.github.com/benjamin-chan/f7dc918e2607b412ccf5", quiet=TRUE)
flow(scripts)
```
